item.title: With your own Docker image
item.description: A worker model of type docker can be spawned by a Hatchery Docker Swarm Setup Docker Worker Model with your own image In this example, we will build a Docker model able to build an AngularJS application with webfonts. To create webfonts, a grunt task (optionally) requires fontforge and ttfautohint. The following tools must be included in the model: Node.js and npm bower grunt-cli gulp-cli fontforge ttfautohint We will use the official nodejs image from Docker.
